rov.rasputin.comm

Class State

  • java.lang.Object
    • rov.rasputin.comm.State

  • public class State
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the state between the client and the ROV.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      State(java.lang.String ROVAddress, int ROVPort, int serverPort, int datawidth, int TXInterval)
      Constructs a new State to maintain connection between the client and a ROV.

    • Constructor Detail

      • State

        public State(java.lang.String ROVAddress,
             int ROVPort,
             int serverPort,
             int datawidth,
             int TXInterval)
      throws java.net.UnknownHostException,
             java.net.SocketException
        Constructs a new State to maintain connection between the client and a ROV.
        Parameters:
        ROVAddress - The IP address or host name of the ROV.
        ROVPort - The port the ROV is listening on.
        serverPort - The port to receive data from the ROV.
        datawidth - The number of channels.
        TXInterval - The time (in milliseconds) between each TX.
        Throws:
        java.net.UnknownHostException - If no IP for the host could be found.
        java.net.SocketException - If the socket could not be opened or binded to.

    • Method Detail

      • set

        public void set(int channel,
                int value)
        Sets the value of a channel.
        Parameters:
        channel - The channel number.
        value - The value of the channel ranging from -128 to 127.

      • get

        public int get(int channel)
        Gets the value of a channel.
        Parameters:
        channel - The channel number.
        Returns:
        The value of the channel received from the server.

        public void startTX()
        Starts the transmitter.
